[[File:Ted Nasmith - Light of Valinor.jp: After the hiding of [[Valinor]] this was the lone gap through the mountains of [[Aman]]. The [[Valar]] would have closed the mountains entirely but, realizing that the Elves, even the [[Vanyar]], needed to be able to breathe the outside air and see the stars, they kept Calacirya open. They also did not want to wholly separate the Vanyar and Noldor from the [[Teleri]] on the coast.<ref>{{S
